thread.title: Trailer stolen from K&S auto in St. Johnsbury
thread.title_full: Trailer stolen from K&S auto in St. Johnsbury - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Trailer stolen from K&S auto in St. Johnsbury
text:
ST. JOHNSBURY, Vt. - Vermont State Police need your help finding a trailer thief.
They say just after 1 a.m. Wednesday, a dark-colored Dodge truck pulled into K&S Auto in St. Johnsbury, someone attached a trailer to the truck, and then left the lot.
The stolen trailer is an 18-foot-long Sure-Trac flatbed with registration APE 758.
